name: playcanvas-editor-ts-template
author: PlayCanvas <support@playcanvas.com>
description: A simple TypeScript template for PlayCanvas that can also sync with your playcanvas.com project

scripts.build-push:debug: npm run build:debug && npm run push
scripts.build-push:release: npm run build:release && npm run push
scripts.watch-push:debug: npm run build:debug && tsc-watch -p tsconfig.debug.json --onSuccess "npm run push"
scripts.watch-push:release: npm run build:release && tsc-watch -p tsconfig.release.json --onSuccess "npm run push"
scripts.build-push: npm run rollup:build && npm run push
